title: Best Bits with Morgan and Special Guest Scuba Steve: PART 1
itunes:title: Best Bits with Morgan and Special Guest Scuba Steve: PART 1
description:
This part of the podcast is the version you all have been wanting as a stand-alone, Morgan and a guest having their in-depth conversations without any interruptions. In this podcast you’ll hear Morgan and Scuba Steve discuss some crazy things that have happened to Morgan recently. Scuba Steve gives an update on his wife’s pregnancy and dad life. They also discuss some fun Food Worlds, complain about something in the world, and share some recent TV/movie recommendations.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
